item.title: Oracle to Kafka — Playing with Confluent’s new Oracle CDC Source Connector in Docker
item.description: Oracle to Kafka — Playing with Confluent’s new Oracle CDC Source Connector in Docker It’s really exciting to have a new option for streaming Oracle data into Kafka. With Confluent releasing their “Oracle CDC Source Premium Connector” there’s a new way to capture data that has been added to, updated, or deleted from Oracle RDBMS with Change Data Capture (CDC). Think of this as a low touch way to stream both the Oracle data and schema changes into Kafka and Schema Registry.
